episode: I submitted a Resolution tho the Oklahoma Libertarain state convention.  I spoke about it briefly and answered questions.  The resolution was adopted unanimously.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I submitted a resolution to back an amendment to the Oklahoma Anatomical Gifts Act, to legalize the purchase and sale of human organs and tissues for transplant.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a significant step. How do you feel about it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was adopted unanimously.  I was quite surprised, and gratified.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's amazing! Congratulations!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you, I had some doubts it would pass.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Understandable, but you did it!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I wish it were that easy to get lawmakers her ein Oklahoma to adopt it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I hope it gains traction there too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: it seems unlikely soon.  It's considered "controversial."

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand, it's challenging.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, lawmakers don't like controversial issues.  They're more concerned about getting reelected than saving lives.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must be frustrating.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes, to get anywhere, we need to get healthcare insurance companies on board with ths.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a crucial step.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, but they're already heavily regulated, and they don't want to rock the boat.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I get that. It's tough to navigate.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm sort of toying with the idea of running for Insurance Commissioner.  I'm very unlikely to win, but it will give me a chance to educate people about the issue.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a brave idea!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: i don't know if I will yet. I don't even have to file paperwork until April next year.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Take your time to decide.
